query:
SELECT w.id, w.studentId, w.name, s.name as studentName, COUNT(wd.id) as daysCount
FROM workouts w
JOIN students s ON w.studentId = s.id
LEFT JOIN workout_days wd ON w.id = wd.workoutId
WHERE w.deletedAt IS NULL
GROUP BY w.id, w.studentId, w.name, s.name
ORDER BY w.id DESC
LIMIT 10;
